Description: DescriptionVestige Folic & Iron Plus CapsulesOne of the most common nutrient deficiencies found in women is that of iron and folic acid. Deficiency of both causes anaemia which results in a decreased number of red blood cells (RBCs) or low hemoglobin levels in the blood. The goal of providing iron-folic acid supplements is to restore normal levels of iron and to replenish hemoglobin levels in the blood. Poor dietary intake of iron accelerated increase in requirements of iron e.g. during pregnancy and lactation; adolescent females and elderly can benefit from the supplementation of iron and folic acid.Vestige Folic & Iron IngredientsEach capsule contains Ferrous Fumarate 250 mg Folic Acid 1 mg Vitamin C (coated) 75 mg Vitamin B12 15 mcg Zinc Sulphate Heptahydrate 100 mg equivalent to elemental zinc 22.7 mg.Vestige Iron & Folic Capsule Benefits /Vestige Iron & Folic Ke Fayde IRON: An important mineral that the body needs to produce red blood cells (RBCs) and in turn improves hemoglobin levels.FOLIC ACID: Needed to form healthy cells especially RBCs. Name: Vestige Ayusante Kidneyhealth
Description: DescriptionVestige Kidney Health / Ayusante Kidney Health / Kidney Health Supplements/ Vestige Ayusante Kidneyhealth One in every 10 adults in India suffers from chronic kidney disease (CKD) and at any given point nearly five lakh patients are in need of life-long dialysis or transplant according to Sanjay K. Agarwal Professor and Head of Nephrology AIIMS.Kidney :The National Kidney Foundation of India estimates that 100 people in a million suffer from kidney ailments in India.The kidneys are bean-shaped organs that serve several essential regulatory roles.The kidneys are a pair of organs located in the back of the abdomen.Each kidney is about 4 or 5 inches long & about the size of a fist.There are two kidneys each about the size of a fist located on either side of the spine at the lowest level of the rib cage.Each kidney contains up to a million functioning units called nephrons.Importance of Kidney:Â The kidneys are powerful chemical factories that perform the followingÂ functions.Â Kidneys filter extra water and wastes out of your blood and produce urine.Remove waste products from the body.Balance the fluids in the body.Release the hormones that regulate blood pressure.Produce an active form of Vitamin D that promotes strong and healthy bones.Causes of Kidney Disease:Â Anyone can develop kidney disease regardless of their age. The main risk factors for developing kidney diseases are: Diabetes.High blood pressure.Cardiovascular (heart and blood vessel) disease.A family history of kidney failure or Renal Failure.Common Symptoms of Kidney Disease: Changes in urination â€”More or less urination than usual changes in the color of urine foamy or bubbly urineSwelling of the feet ankles hands or face â€” Fluid the kidneys canâ€™t remove stays in the tissues.Fatigue or weakness â€” due to the build-up of wastes.Shortness of breath â€”Because the excess fluid can build up in the lungs.Itching â€” waste build-up in the body can cause severe itching especially in the legs Loss of appetite.Nausea and vomiting.Common kidney problems include:Â

Name: Vestige Spirulina Capsules
Description: DescriptionVestige Spirulina Capsules Vestige Spirulina is a natural algae powder that is high in protein and a good source of antioxidants B-vitamins Vitamins A C D E and minerals. Description: DescriptionVestige Ayusante Vital Complex / Ayusante Vital ComplexDo you know what is oxidative stress ?Oxidative stressÂ is an imbalance between the production of free radicals and the ability of the body to counteract or detoxify their harmful effects through neutralization by antioxidants.Â When there are more free radicals present than can be kept in balance by antioxidants the free radicals can start doing damage to bodyÂ proteinsÂ fatty tissueÂ &Â DNAÂ structure ofÂ your body. It is one of the major risk factors for a number of chronic diseases including diabetes cardiovascular diseases and cancer.Why Obesity is Dangerous / Facts About ObesityWorldwide obesity has nearly tripled between 1975 and 2016.overweight is a BMI greater than or equal to 25obesity is a BMI greater than or equal to 30.In 2016 more than 1.9 billion adults aged 18 years and older were overweight. Of these over 650 million adults were obese.In 2016 39% of adults aged 18 years and over (39% of men and 40% of women) were overweight.Overall about 13% of the worldâ€™s adult population (11% of men and 15% of women) were obese in 2016.The worldwide prevalence of obesity nearly tripled between 1975 and 2016.41 million children under the age of 5 were overweight or obese in 2016.Worldwide at least 2.8 million people die each year as a result of being overweight or obese.THE GOOD NEWS: Obesity is preventable.What causes obesity and overweight?The basic cause of obesity and overweight is an energy imbalance between calorie intake and calories used.An increased intake of high calories food and a fatty diet.An increase in physical inactivity due to the increasingly sedentary nature of the lifestyle and nature of work.Factors affecting fitnessPhysical fitness is considered a measure of the bodyâ€™s ability to function efficiently in work and leisure activities Factors affecting fitness:DietExercisePhysical disabilityIllness and fatigueIntake of DrugsStressEnvironmentLifestyleCommon health consequences of overweight and obesity?Raised BMI is a major risk factor for noncommunicable diseases such as:Cardiovascular diseases (mainly heart disease and stroke) which were the leading cause of death in 2012Â Diabetes;Musculoskeletal disorders (especially osteoarthritis â€“ a highly disabling degenerative disease of the joints);Some cancers (including endometrial breast ovarian prostate liver gallbladder kidney and colon).What is the importance of weight management?Losing weight as part of weight management is important because weighing too much is not good for healthBeing overweight increases your risk of health conditions such as heart problems high blood pressure type 2 diabetes osteoarthritis sleep problems respiratory (breathing) problems and many othersThe best way to lose weight is to eat fewer calories (units of energy that your body gets from food) and get regular exerciseLosing even a small amount of weight can lower your risk of health problemsHow can overweight and obesity be reduced?At the individual level people can:Reduce high calories diet intake from total fats and sugars.Use fresh fruit and vegetables as well as legumes whole grains and nuts.Regular physical activity (60 minutes a day for children and 150 minutes spread through the week for adults).How to reduce weight â€“ TipsDrink 3-4 litres of water daily.Eat less amount of refined carbohydrates like white bread pasta etc.Go for smaller portions of meals.Keep It is one of the major risk factors for a number of chronic diseases including diabetes cardiovascular diseases and cancer.Why Obesity is Dangerous / Facts About ObesityWorldwide obesity has nearly tripled between 1975 and 2016.overweight is a BMI greater than or equal to 25obesity is a BMI greater than or equal to 30.In 2016 more than 1.9 billion adults aged 18 years and older were overweight. Of these over 650 million adults were obese.In 2016 39% of adults aged 18 years and over (39% of men and 40% of women) were overweight.Overall about 13% of the worldâ€™s adult population (11% of men and 15% of women) were obese in 2016.The worldwide prevalence of obesity nearly tripled between 1975 and 2016.41 million children under the age of 5 were overweight or obese in 2016.Worldwide at least 2.8 million people die each year as a result of being overweight or obese.THE GOOD NEWS: Obesity is preventable.What causes obesity and overweight?The basic cause of obesity and overweight is an energy imbalance between calorie intake and calories used.An increased intake of high calories food and a fatty diet.An increase in physical inactivity due to the increasingly sedentary nature of the lifestyle and nature of work.Factors affecting fitnessPhysical fitness is considered a measure of the bodyâ€™s ability to function efficiently in work and leisure activities Factors affecting fitness:DietExercisePhysical disabilityIllness and fatigueIntake of DrugsStressEnvironmentLifestyleCommon health consequences of overweight and obesity?Raised BMI is a major risk factor for noncommunicable diseases such as:Cardiovascular diseases (mainly heart disease and stroke) which were the leading cause of death in 2012Â Diabetes;Musculoskeletal disorders (especially osteoarthritis â€“ a highly disabling degenerative disease of the joints);Some cancers (including endometrial breast ovarian prostate liver gallbladder kidney and colon).What is the importance of weight management?Losing weight as part of weight management is important because weighing too much is not good for healthBeing overweight increases your risk of health conditions such as heart problems high blood pressure type 2 diabetes osteoarthritis sleep problems respiratory (breathing) problems and many othersThe best way to lose weight is to eat fewer calories (units of energy that your body gets from food) and get regular exerciseLosing even a small amount of weight can lower your risk of health problemsHow can overweight and obesity be reduced?At the individual level people can:Reduce high calories diet intake from total fats and sugars.Use fresh fruit and vegetables as well as legumes whole grains and nuts.Regular physical activity (60 minutes a day for children and 150 minutes spread through the week for adults).How to reduce weight â€“ TipsDrink 3-4 litres of water daily.Eat less amount of refined carbohydrates like white bread pasta etc.Go for smaller portions of meals.Keep healthy food around in case you are hungry.Eat more of fibre-rich foods.Chew food slowly and properly.Avoid processed foods.#Veslim #VeslimShakeÂ  #VeslimShakeBenefits #VeslimShakePrice #VeslimShakeReviews #WeightLoss #WeightManagement #Obesity #Fitness #Diet #Vestproduct #Vestige

Description: DescriptionVestige Prime Krill OilWhat is Vestige Krill Oil?Krill Oil Detail: Krill OilÂ supplement that is rapidly gaining popularity as an alternative to fish oil. Krill oil is mostly available in soft gel capsule form and not available in a form for Krill oil Tablets. Krill oil is oil from a tiny shrimplike fish. Krill from the Antarctic is also called Euphausia Superba. They are found in the colder waters of the ocean. Krill is found in the oceans off of Antarctica Canada and Japan. Krill primarily serve as a food source for other animals in the ocean like whales seals penguins squid and fish.Krill Oil Vs Fish oil:Â Krill oil is better than fish oil.Â Krill oil is a supplement that contains the omega-3 fatty acids EPA and DHA. The chemical structure of its fatty acids and red color set it apart from fish oil.Source of Krill Oil:Â Antarctic Krill which is the source of Krill Oil. The Southern Ocean constitutes one of the most remote areas on our planet and as such is it isolated from many environmental contaminants.Â Antarctic krill feeds on plankton close to the bottom of the food chain and is therefore free of any accumulation of contaminants such as heavy metals that are typically found in many fishes.Krill Oil CapsulesÂ ContentsKrill oil is a rich source of phospholipids and phospholipid-bound omega fatty acids.Vestige Krill oil capsules are a rich source of Omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids: EPA (Eicosapentaenoic acid) and DHA (Docosahexaenoic acid).Unlike fish oil the omega-3 fatty acids in Krill oil are absorbed and carried to the bodyâ€™s cells in phospholipid form that reaches and gets assimilated in all major organs.Krill oil also contains a powerful natural antioxidant â€“ Astaxanthin.Â Vestige Prime Krill Oil Extraction processVestige Prime Krill Oil contains K-Real Krill oil manufactured by a propriety process calledÂ Multi-Stage Oil extraction (MSOÂ®)This process preserves the natural nutrient profile of Krill Oil while removing spoilage components such as â€“ Trimethylamine (TMA) â€“ Total Volatile Nitrogen (TVN) â€“ Other oxidative derivatives.It leads to improves physical properties and odor â€“ Less fishy odor â€“ Optimal viscosity and stability â€“ No fishy burps.Â Krill oilâ€™s best brandÂ isÂ Vestige Krill oil.Antarctic Krill (Euphausia Superba):Â Antarctic Krill are swimming crustaceans that live in the Antarctic waters of the Southern Ocean.Krill Oil Benefits/ Krill Oil Usage / Vestige Prime Krill Oil Benefits / Krill oil ke faydeKrill Oil is a phospholipid-bound omega-3 product that is better absorbed into the blood and target organs such as the brain heart liver etc.Krill oil is an excellent source of healthy fats. The omega-3 fats in krill oil may be easier to absorb than those in fish oil but more studies are needed to say for sure.Krill Oil Capsules supports cardiovascular health &Â It helps to sustain healthy cholesterol levels.Studies have found that krill oil supplement like other sources of omega-3 fats may be effective at improving blood lipid levels and other risk factors for heart disease.Omega 3 in Krill Oil helps to prevent blood clots that can causes strokes and heart attacks (CAD).Krill oil helps to improve joint lubrication and overall joint function. Several animal and human studies have found that taking krill oil supplements helps improve joint pain and arthritis symptoms though more studies are needed.Krill Oil helps to improve mental concentration alertness memory and mental focus.Krill oil benefits to the skin It gives a radiant complexion and increased moisture levels in the skin.Astaxanthin in Krill oil is a potent antioxidant that protects the body against free radical damage.Consumption of krill oil was shown to have benefits to human health including heart health anti-inflammation liver benefits muscle benefits vascular benefits and joint benefits.Several studies have found that Krill Oil Omega-3 fats may help improve period pain and PMS. Description: DescriptionVestige Coenzyme Q10Coenzyme Q10 is an essential chemical that the body produces naturally. A deficiency of this chemical can have adverseÂ effects andÂ coenzymeÂ Q10 supplements may offer health benefits.Â Co-enzyme Q10 research has yielded a Nobel Prize in biochemistry in 1978 when the British scientist Peter Mitchell mapped out exactly how the nutrient works inside the cell.Â Â It is a powerful antioxidant that protects your cells from molecules that may cause damage. Your CoQ10 levels can drop due to age stress and cholesterol-lowering statin drug therapy and taking a CoQ10 supplement can help replenish your Coq10 back to optimal levels.Vestige Coenzyme Q10 benefits / Co-Enzyme Q 10 ke fayde / Co-Enzyme Q 10 UsesCoq10 might improve exercise tolerance in angina.Co-Enzyme Q 10 decreasing the risk of heart problems in people who have had a recent myocardial infarction.Co-Enzyme Q10 is good for blood vessel complications caused by coronary bypass surgery.Co-Enzyme Q 10 is good for Hypertension management Combining Coq10 with other antihypertensive agents may permit a decrease of antihypertensive dose as it can enhance the effects of antihypertensive medications.Taking Coq10 orally may lower systolic blood pressure by about 25% after 10-weeks of therapy in some people.The Role of Coq10 in Female Fertility:Â Â As women age their ability to get pregnant decreases because of poor egg formation and egg quality also drops with age.Â CoQ10 levels decline to start at age 21 and can drop with agingÂ women may need to supplement withÂ Coenzyme q10 support fertility.Â CoQ10 plays a vital role in the production of the energy required by egg cells and may support their normal functions.The Role of Coq10 in Male Fertility:Â Coq10 treatment can improve the movement and density of sperm in men with certain types of infertility.Â Stress sun exposure and smoking can cause your body to make molecules called reactive oxygen species (ROS). While the term ROS may be unfamiliar to you you have likely heard people talking about â€œfree radical damageâ€.Â Antioxidants can help protect your cells from ROS damage and taking antioxidants has been associated with increased sperm cell count and motility.Â Coq10 is a powerful antioxidant that can help neutralize excess ROS.Â Therefore Vestige Coenzyme q 10 may be necessary to support a healthy sex life.Improving the immune system of people with HIVÂ / AIDS: Coq10 is being used for strengthening the immune system of people with HIV / AIDS.Â Â Preventing migraine headaches (prophylaxis): Oral Vestige Coenzyme q10 capsules helps in preventing migraine headaches. It can decrease the frequency of headaches by about 36 %. However Coq10 does not seem to be effective in treating migraine once it has developed.Lower levels of Coq10 have been observed in people with Parkinsonâ€™s disease. Increasing Coq10 may increase the level of dopamine which is thought to be lower in people with Parkinsonâ€™s disease. It has also been suggested that CoQ10 might protect brain cells from damage by free radicals.Statins-induced myopathy Statins sometimes cause muscle pain. Oral CoQ10 might reduce this pain.It increases a healthy life span its lower dose of reducing oxidation and DNA double-strand breaks and a combination of a diet rich in polyunsaturated fatty acids and Vestige Coenzyme q10 supplementation leads to a longer life span in rats.Muscular dystrophy: Oral Co Enzyme q10 seems to improve physical performance in this inherited disorder.Cancer: Coq10 is being investigated as a treatment for cancer and as a relief from cancer treatment side-effect.Â Â Â CoQ10 plays a critical role in the protection of cell DNA and cell survival both of which are strongly linked to cancer prevention and recurrence.CoQ10 can reduce oxidative damage and inflammation that results in diseases of the lungs.CoQ10 has been shown to protect brain cells from oxidative damage and reduce the action of harmful compounds that can lead to brain disease.CoQ10 canÂ increase insulin sensitivity and improve blood sugar levels.When applied directly to the skin CoQ10 can reduce sun damage and increase antioxidant protection. Name: Vestige Ayusante Kidneyhealth
Description: DescriptionVestige Kidney Health / Ayusante Kidney Health / Kidney Health Supplements/ Vestige Ayusante Kidneyhealth One in every 10 adults in India suffers from chronic kidney disease (CKD) and at any given point nearly five lakh patients are in need of life-long dialysis or transplant according to Sanjay K. Agarwal Professor and Head of Nephrology AIIMS.Kidney :The National Kidney Foundation of India estimates that 100 people in a million suffer from kidney ailments in India.The kidneys are bean-shaped organs that serve several essential regulatory roles.The kidneys are a pair of organs located in the back of the abdomen.Each kidney is about 4 or 5 inches long & about the size of a fist.There are two kidneys each about the size of a fist located on either side of the spine at the lowest level of the rib cage.Each kidney contains up to a million functioning units called nephrons.Importance of Kidney:Â The kidneys are powerful chemical factories that perform the followingÂ functions.Â Kidneys filter extra water and wastes out of your blood and produce urine.Remove waste products from the body.Balance the fluids in the body.Release the hormones that regulate blood pressure.Produce an active form of Vitamin D that promotes strong and healthy bones.Causes of Kidney Disease:Â Anyone can develop kidney disease regardless of their age. The main risk factors for developing kidney diseases are: Diabetes.High blood pressure.Cardiovascular (heart and blood vessel) disease.A family history of kidney failure or Renal Failure.Common Symptoms of Kidney Disease: Changes in urination â€”More or less urination than usual changes in the color of urine foamy or bubbly urineSwelling of the feet ankles hands or face â€” Fluid the kidneys canâ€™t remove stays in the tissues.Fatigue or weakness â€” due to the build-up of wastes.Shortness of breath â€”Because the excess fluid can build up in the lungs.Itching â€” waste build-up in the body can cause severe itching especially in the legs Loss of appetite.Nausea and vomiting.Common kidney problems include:Â
